features: ✅ EpicDev Comfort Foam Seat Cushion: Say goodbye to tailbone pain with our premium memory foam cushion designed for all-day sitting comfort. Whether you're at the office, in your car, or in a wheelchair, our cushion provides the relief you deserve

✅ Unmatched Tailbone Pain Relief: Our ergonomic cushion is engineered with precision-cut memory foam that conforms to your body's contours, reducing pressure on your tailbone, lower back, and hips. Experience immediate and long-lasting relief

✅ Non-Slip Design: Tired of constantly adjusting your seat cushion? Our non-slip bottom ensures your cushion stays securely in place, so you can focus on your tasks without interruptions. Say goodbye to uncomfortable shifts

✅ Versatile and Portable: Use our cushion wherever you go. It's perfect for office chairs, car seats, and wheelchairs. Its compact size makes it easy to carry, ensuring comfort and support are always within reach

✅ Breathable and Durable: The breathable mesh cover promotes air circulation, keeping you cool during extended periods of sitting. Plus, it's easy to remove and machine washable, ensuring long-lasting use

✅ Health and Wellness: Invest in your well-being with our seat cushion. By reducing pressure on your tailbone and improving posture, you'll experience less fatigue, better concentration, and improved overall comfort

✅ Satisfaction Guaranteed: We stand by the quality of our products, which is why we offer a satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely happy with your purchase, contact us for a hassle-free return or replacement. Elevate your sitting experience with EpicDev

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well, I have hit my aches and pains and pills era.many are ..yep, in my bottom on top of the occasional back woes. I realized the two chairs I used most frequently are not cushioned, so I grabbed this on sale. I got the smallest version and it fits perfectly on a typical dining or folding chair. I'm 5ft, 170 so my tush is not tiny. I think it does it's job. I don't see how any improvements can be made. Sometimes when you hurt, nothing entirely helps, but it is a big improvement. If you are like me and don't realize that your typing posture is less than stellar it will throw you off a day or so bc you are actually sitting his you are supposed to sit. It is not heavy so a person who has mobility issues shouldn't have any problems moving it around. It doesn't slide as it has little rubber nubs on the bottom. This would also be good for someone like myself who basically needs a booster seat to drive. I don't see how there could be any improvement, though I think a man or someone with a large chair would enjoy a larger cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable for Wooden chairs
reviews.reviewText: I have a wooden chair for my home office and this is a game changer. It’s a soft cushion and also isn’t too firm. I can already feel the difference in my seating posture after just a few days.

reviews.reviewText: Wonderful at Ball Games to help an old guys bottom!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You have to read entire description...............
reviews.reviewText: No where does this say firm or any other words that would indicate this is a firm cushion.That being said, this is more on the softer side and not as thick as the 3 inch cushions I have . This cushion is 2 1/2 inches thick ,yes I measured both of my cushions. {see my review on other cushion}The thickness of a cushion doesn't tell the whole story,it's the type of cushion they use ,and by that I mean cushion density.This cushion is thinner and softer so it is less dense. My other cushion is way more dense and thicker at 3 inches {see my recent review on that cushions review}.Now, this is made well ,good construction , but if you are over 170 lbs this might be too soft for you,meaning it will flatten out some to about 1 1/2 inches to maybe 1 inch . If under 170lbs and you don't mind a softer cushion and don't like them too firm, then by all means buy this.If you like a firmer cushion and don't want the cushion to flatten out as much and over 170lbs then see my recent review on that cushion. It's not a hard firm ,just medium firm,very nice. <-------- then buy this one .As for me I use both at different times depending upon how I feel. My weight is around low 160's and evenly proportioned so both work for me.Thanks for taking the time to read my reviews ,I take them seriously.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cushion consists of a thin slab of foam that compresses to a thin sliver no more than half an inch thick. The foam is encased by a starkly ugly black cover that, had I known it would look like this , I would never have ordered it.
